description: Try our easy to follow Brown Rice Nourish Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Microwave,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Rice,Quick & easy lunch
name: Brown Rice Nourish Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk teriyaki sauce, oil and vinegar together in a small bowl to make dressing. Place rice in a shallow microwave safe bowl, add 2 tbs dressing and mix to combine. Make a shallow well in the centre of rice.
Crack the egg into the rice, cover with a microwave safe lid and microwave for 1 minute on high or until egg is just set.
Place carrot, avocado and cucumber around egg and on top of rice, drizzle with remaining dressing and scatter with sesame seeds. Serve immediately.
